name: Silver cup of lions (Sasanian inspired)
description:
A silver cup designed with golden lions, inspired by Sasanian culture.

They build upon their pervious legacies improving on nearly everything!

Sasanian empire named after the House of Sasan, endured for over four centuries, from 224 to 651 AD, making it the longest-lived Persian imperial dynasty.


They say taste changes with the material, how would a drink served in a silver cup taste?

2048x2048 60FPS
